collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (18 total Queries, 18 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: SELECT `appointment`.`appointmentDate`, (SELECT SUM(appointmentFee) FROM appointment a WHERE a.appointmentDate = appointment.appointmentDate) as totalRevenue, COUNT(appointment.appointmentID) as totalAppointments FROM `appointment` WHERE `appointment`.`businessID` IS NULL AND `appointment`.`appointmentDate` >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) GROUP BY `appointment`.`appointmentDate`

SELECT CONCAT(MONTH(createdAT), '-', YEAR(createdAT)) AS label, SUM(hospitalCharges) AS hospitalCharges FROM appointment WHERE businessID = NULL GROUP BY YEAR(createdAT), MONTH(createdAT) ORDER BY YEAR(createdAT), MONTH(createdAT)

SELECT CONCAT(MONTH(Date), '-', YEAR(Date)) AS label, COALESCE(SUM(Value), 0) AS hospitalCharges FROM invoices WHERE idBusiness = NULL GROUP BY YEAR(Date), MONTH(Date) ORDER BY YEAR(Date), MONTH(Date)

SELECT CONCAT(MONTH(createdAT), '-', YEAR(createdAT)) AS label, SUM(hospitalCharges) AS totalCharges FROM labtest WHERE businessId = NULL GROUP BY YEAR(CreatedAT), MONTH(CreatedAT) ORDER BY YEAR(CreatedAT), MONTH(CreatedAT)
